name: panfish
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any small fish that can be cooked in a pan, especially one that someone catches rather than buys: They complain that the little fish - the nice panfish that you take home and fry up for dinner - aren't there anymore. Allow two small, cleaned pan fish per person. Crappies are the most common panfishes caught here. These are among the best of the pan fishes.
More examplesFewer examplesThe lake is popular with anglers hoping for bass, walleye, and panfish. They pulled pan fish out of the creek before making their way up the rocky trail.
